text: 9|98|haey knongchamnaom puok areab chonobt  mean anakakhleah ban chat  touk avei delke ban brichcheak( knong meakra a l laoh) kuchea karkhatabng  haey ke nung rngcham meul krohthnak kaetlaeng champoh puok anak . te  krohakrak noh kaetmean champoh puokke towvinh te . haey  a l laoh mha lyy  mha doeng .
